attributes.action: Legistate for Transgender safe spaces toilets, hospital wards and refuge centres
attributes.additional_details: Following the supreme ruling over the the definition of what a woman is in the Equalities Act 2010, Trans people especially women have lost access to safe spaces and as one of the most vulnerable and persecuted communities with one of the highest rates of sexual abuse, rape and violence against them per head, the need for safe spaces is urgently required so they can live their lives in peace and safety.
attributes.background: To legislate for safe spaces for Trans people to include toilets, hospital wards and refuge centres.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce a legal requirement for transgender and non-binary only spaces
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725239
